alert.note: Alert for Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 6:13PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Todd County through 800 PM CDT... At 712 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Kilgore to 3 miles northwest of Sicangu Village. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rosebud, Saint Francis, Spring Creek, Upper Cut Meat, Lakeview, Fairgrounds Housing, Sicangu Village, Two Strike, Hidden Timber, Grass Mountain and Rosebud Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
